trans-unit.source: Populates <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects with XML Schema data type definitions for .NET Framework types that are serialized using SOAP encoding.
trans-unit.target: 使用以 SOAP 編碼序列化之 .NET Framework 型別的 XML 結構描述資料型別定義，填入 (Populate) <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding of SOAP Web service messages is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 訊息編碼的 SOAP Web 服務是在 SOAP 1.1 規格的第 5 節中所述。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class provides a programmatic representation of an XML Schema definition language (XSD) document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>類別提供 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 文件的程式設計表示法。

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects to which element declarations obtained from type mappings are to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要將從型別對應取得的項目宣告加入其中的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter" /> class, which supplies the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects to which XML Schema element declarations are to be added.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter" /> 類別的新執行個體，此類別會提供要將 XML 結構描述項目宣告加入其中的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: You should not create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您不應建立的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
trans-unit.target: 加入 SOAP 編碼的訊息定義之各個項目部分的資料型別定義至適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 訊息定義之項目部分的內部 .NET Framework 型別對應。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
trans-unit.target: 加入 SOAP 編碼的訊息定義之各個項目部分的資料型別定義至適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 訊息定義之項目部分的內部 .NET Framework 型別對應。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to export a type definition for the parent element of the WSDL parts; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要匯出 WSDL 部分之父項目的型別定義，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
trans-unit.target: 加入 SOAP 編碼的訊息定義之各個項目部分的資料型別定義至適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
An internal mapping between a .NET Framework type and an XML Schema element.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 型別和 XML 結構描述項目之間的內部對應。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object a data type definition for a .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 將 .NET Framework 型別的資料型別定義加入適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
